document.heading: PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO COUNCIL RESOLUTION NO. SI-R21-009
Tribal Member Distribution Authorization Act Amendment of 2021
document.preamble: At a duly called meeting of the Council of San Ildefonso Pueblo on the 24th day of May, 2021, the following Resolution was adopted:

recital.text: the Council finds that it is in the best interest of the Pueblo to authorize and direct a distribution of available funds to all members of the Pueblo with conditions to encourage COVID-19 vaccination of Members of the Pueblo.
that the Council hereby enacts the attached amendment to the law entitled, "TRIBAL MEMBER DISTRIBUTION AUTHORIZATION ACT AMENDMENT OF 2021."

procedural-data.text: The foregoing resolution was duly voted upon by the Council on May 24 , 2021, at a meeting with a vote of 8 in favor, 0 opposed, 1 abstaining and 1 absent (Governor presiding and not voting) pursuant to the authority vested in the Council by the Agreement of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso.
DELIVERY OF THE RESOLUTION TO THE GOVERNOR:
Resolution No. SI-R21-009 was presented to the Governor of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso on the

26th day of May , 2021, pursuant to the Governing document of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Agreement"), GOVERNOR, Sec. 4 (c), and will become effective after signature by the Governor or veto override by the Council.

attachment.heading: TRIBAL MEMBER DISTRIBUTION AUTHORIZATION ACT AMENDMENT OF 2021

section.heading: Short Title
section.text: This enactment shall be known as the "TRIBAL MEMBER DISTRIBUTION AUTHORIZATION ACT AMENDMENT OF 2021 ("Amendment")."

section.heading: Purpose
section.text: The purpose of this Amendment is to authorize and direct a distribution of available funds to all members of the Pueblo with conditions to encourage COVID-19 vaccinations.

section.heading: Findings
section.text: Title 19, Chapter 19, Section 19.4.1.040 of the Code is hereby amended to add the following subsection (g) as follows:

para.text: Due to the ongoing effects of the COVID-19 pandemic, the Council has determined that it is in the best interest of the Members of the Pueblo to authorize and direct a one-time distribution to begin in June 2021 to members of the Pueblo with a financial incentive to encourage all Members of the Pueblo to obtain a COVID-19 vaccination.

section.heading: Amendment
section.text: Title 19, Chapter 19, Section 19.4.1.050 of the Code is hereby amended to add the following subsection (e) as follows:

para.text: The Governor is hereby authorized and directed to issue a one-time distribution of available funds to members of the Pueblo as follows:
Tribal Members enrolled as of April 30, 2021 who are age 15 or younger shall receive $500 distribution;
Tribal Members enrolled as of April 30, 2021 who are over the age of 15 shall receive a $400 distribution;

Tribal Members enrolled as of April 30, 2021 who are over the age of 15, who have been fully vaccinated and who submit a copy of their CDC vaccination card shall receive an additional $100 distribution; provided, that the deadline for submitting a copy of a CDC vaccination card is September 30, 2021.
